[![Logo](https://github.com/phipsonlab/jazzPanda/blob/main/inst/images/jazzPanda_logo.png)](https://github.com/phipsonlab/jazzPanda)

### 

jazzPanda: A hybrid approach to find spatially relevant marker genes

in image-based spatial transcriptomics data

  
[**Explore the vignette
Â»**](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/articles/jazzPanda.html)  
  

## Introduction

The jazzPanda package contains functions to find marker genes based on
the spatial coordinates for imaging-based spatial transcriptomics
technologies including 10x Xenium, NanoString CosMx and Vizgen MERSCOPE.

## Installation

To install jazzPanda from Bioconductor, use the following commands:

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("jazzPanda")
```

To install jazzPanda from github, use the following commands:

``` r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("phipsonlab/jazzPanda")
```

In order to view the vignette for jazzPanda use the following command:

``` r
browseVignettes("jazzPanda")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`compute_permp()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/compute_permp.md)
  : Calculate a p-value for correlation with permutation.
- [`create_genesets()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/create_genesets.md)
  : Convert the coordinates of set of genes into vectors.
- [`.check_binning()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-check_binning.md)
  : helper function to check the input of binning
- [`.check_valid_input()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-check_valid_input.md)
  : helper function to check the inputs passed to marker detection
  function
- [`.check_valid_names()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-check_valid_names.md)
  : helper function to check the names of gene/cluster/sample
- [`.compute_observation()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-compute_observation.md)
  : Compute observation statistic for permutation framework
- [`.compute_permutation()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-compute_permutation.md)
  : Compute permutation statistics for permutation framework
- [`.convert_data()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-convert_data.md)
  : Convert
  SingleCellExperiment/SpatialExperiment/SpatialFeatureExperiment
  objects to list object for jazzPanda.
- [`.create_cor_mg_result()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-create_cor_mg_result.md)
  : Create a marker gene result object for correlation approach
- [`.create_lm_mg_result()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-create_lm_mg_result.md)
  : Create a marker gene result object for linear modelling approach
- [`.get_cluster_vectors()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-get_cluster_vectors.md)
  : Create spatial vectors for clusters
- [`.get_gene_vectors_cm()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-get_gene_vectors_cm.md)
  : Create spatial vectors for genes from count matrix and cell
  coordinates
- [`.get_gene_vectors_tr()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-get_gene_vectors_tr.md)
  : Create spatial vectors for genes from transcript coordinates
- [`.get_lasso_coef()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/dot-get_lasso_coef.md)
  : help function to get lasso coefficient for every cluster for a given
  model
- [`get_cor()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_cor.md)
  : Get observed correlation cor_mg_result
- [`get_full_mg()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_full_mg.md)
  : Get full lasso result from glm_mg_result
- [`get_perm_adjp()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_perm_adjp.md)
  : Get permutation adjusted p value from cor_mg_result
- [`get_perm_p()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_perm_p.md)
  : Get permutation p value from cor_mg_result
- [`get_top_mg()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_top_mg.md)
  : Get top lasso result from glm_mg_result
- [`get_vectors()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/get_vectors.md)
  : Vectorise the spatial coordinates
- [`jazzPanda-package`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/jazzPanda-package.md)
  [`jazzPanda`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/jazzPanda-package.md)
  : jazzPanda: A hybrid approach to find spatially relevant marker genes
  in image-based spatial transcriptomics data
- [`lasso_markers()`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/lasso_markers.md)
  : Find marker genes with spatial coordinates
- [`rep1_clusters`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep1_clusters.md)
  : Rep1 selected cells
- [`rep1_neg`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep1_neg.md)
  : Rep1 negative control genes within the selected region.
- [`rep1_sub`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep1_sub.md)
  : A small section of Xenium human breast cancer rep1.
- [`rep2_clusters`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep2_clusters.md)
  : Rep2 selected cells
- [`rep2_neg`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep2_neg.md)
  : Rep2 negative control genes within the selected region.
- [`rep2_sub`](https://phipsonlab.github.io/jazzPanda/reference/rep2_sub.md)
  : A small section of Xenium human breast cancer rep2.
